properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Little River Inlet to Murrells Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Murrells Inlet to South Santee River SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Cape Fear NC to Little River Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Surf City to Cape Fear NC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 20 at 10:44PM EST until January 21 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, north winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts
frequently up to 35 kt, and seas peaking in the 5 to 9 ft range.

For the Small Craft Advisory, north winds 15 to 25 kt with
occasional gusts up to 30 kt and seas peaking in the 4 to 7 ft
range.

* WHERE...Southeast North Carolina and Northeast South Carolina
coastal waters.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 3 PM Tuesday to noon EST
Wednesday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 4 AM to 3 PM EST
Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for strong to severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 3 PM EST TUESDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM TUESDAY TO NOON EST WEDNESDAY
